REQUESTOR.SettingsExcludeImageHint: Exclude the image in chat cards by default unless explicitly provided.
REQUESTOR.SettingsTrustModeHint: DO NOT CHANGE THIS SETTING IF YOU DO NOT FULLY TRUST YOUR PLAYERS. This changes the permissions for who can make and accept requests. (1) GM ONLY: Only the GM can make requests, and players can only click buttons made by a GM. (2) GM and OWN: Anyone can make requests, and players can only click buttons made by a GM or themselves. (3) FREE: Anyone can make requests, and anyone can click any buttons.
REQUESTOR.SettingsTrustModeOptionGM: Request: GM only. Accept: Only if GM requested
REQUESTOR.SettingsTrustModeOptionOwn: Request: Anyone. Accept: Only if GM or self
REQUESTOR.WarningGM: Aborted: You are only allowed to execute the GM's requests.
REQUESTOR.WarningNoPermission: Aborted: Only the GM is allowed to make requests.
REQUESTOR.WarningOwn: Aborted: You are only allowed to execute the GM's requests or your own.
